description:
Receive live traffic news
RoadEagle retrieves traffic information from various open data portals (most of them made available by road operators), displays the data in a list and makes it available to TraFF-aware applications, such as Navit.

Currently Poland and Lithuania are supported. A data connection is required.

The actual data reported may vary between countries. Also, as RoadEagle needs to convert the data from different formats to TraFF, it may not be able to represent all traffic messages as intended by their creators.

This app receives requests from compatible apps (consumers) which may expose the device location (and, possibly, where you intend to travel). Because of the location information, consumer apps may refuse to send such requests to apps without location permission. This is the only thing RoadEagle uses this permission for; it will never request a location update. 

Photo by Joanna Pędzich-Opioła | CC_BY 2.0
